plot: A man comes to visit his paralyzed brother in the hospital. The conversation is always a monologue, this time will have a reaction.
title: Hablando con la pared
plot_es: A man comes to visit his paralyzed brother in the hospital. The conversation is always a monologue, this time will have a reaction.
